se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api

Interface PersistenceOperations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JpaQueryOperations
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaPersistenceOperations

    public interface PersistenceOperations
extends JpaQueryOperations
    Specification for commonly used Persistence operations.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends NazgulEntity>
      void      		 create(T entity)
      Creates the provided entity and persists it within a JPA-aware database.
      <T extends NazgulEntity>
      void      		 delete(T toDelete)
      Deletes the persistent state of the provided entity from a JPA-aware database.
      <T extends NazgulEntity>
      void      		 refresh(T entity)
      Replaces the state of the provided NazgulEntity with the database current state.
      <T extends NazgulEntity>
      T      		 update(T entity)
      Updates the provided entity by merging its state into an existing entity within a JPA-aware entity.

      • Methods inherited from interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.JpaQueryOperations

        findByPrimaryKey, fireNamedQuery, fireNamedQuery, fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit, fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit

    • Method Detail

      • create

        <T extends NazgulEntity> void create(T entity)
                              throws PersistenceOperationException
        Creates the provided entity and persists it within a JPA-aware database.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to persist.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be created.

      • update

        <T extends NazgulEntity> T update(T entity)
                           throws PersistenceOperationException
        Updates the provided entity by merging its state into an existing entity within a JPA-aware entity.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to update / merge.
        Returns:
        The updated entity, which should be used instead of the entity argument submitted.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be updated.

      • refresh

        <T extends NazgulEntity> void refresh(T entity)
                               throws PersistenceOperationException
        Replaces the state of the provided NazgulEntity with the database current state.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to refresh.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be refreshed.

      • delete

        <T extends NazgulEntity> void delete(T toDelete)
                              throws PersistenceOperationException
        Deletes the persistent state of the provided entity from a JPA-aware database.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        toDelete - The entity to delete.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be deleted.
